message: Child agent initialized. Beginning test mission to verify spawn_child_agent functionality works correctly.

Verified fix at real_mcp_server.py:2336 - deploy_headless_agent.fn() is correctly used. I am successfully executing as a spawned child agent, proving the spawn_child_agent functionality works. Now performing comprehensive verification tests.
Testing critical functionality: attempting to spawn grandchild agent (depth=2) to verify multi-level hierarchy works with the spawn_child_agent fix.
Checking grandchild agent status and preparing final comprehensive verification report.

Test mission COMPLETE. Comprehensive verification performed with documented evidence. RESULTS: (1) Successfully spawned as child agent at depth=1 by orchestrator - verified via AGENT_REGISTRY.json and tmux session. (2) Successfully spawned grandchild agent test_grandchild_agent-214511-2f5152 at depth=2 - proving multi-level hierarchy works. (3) All MCP tools verified functional: update_agent_progress, report_agent_finding, spawn_child_agent. (4) Multi-level hierarchy correctly maintained: orchestrator -> test_child_agent-214344-144595 -> test_grandchild_agent-214511-2f5152. (5) Coordination system working - both agents visible, can see each other's status. (6) Fix at real_mcp_server.py:2336 confirmed: deploy_headless_agent.fn() enables multi-level spawning. (7) Grandchild agent completed successfully at 21:45:58. EVIDENCE: AGENT_REGISTRY.json lines 11-75, tmux sessions verified, 4 critical findings reported. TEST VERDICT: spawn_child_agent fix is FULLY FUNCTIONAL.
